title: The Best 27 AI 3D Model Generator Tools in 2025
summary: Discover the power of creativity with our AI 3D Model Generator category. These innovative tools enable users to effortlessly create stunning 3D models for various applications, from gaming to product design. With advanced algorithms, you can generate high-quality, customizable models in minutes, saving time and enhancing your projects. Whether you're a designer, developer, or hobbyist, our curated selection of AI-driven solutions will elevate your work to new heights. Explore our collection today and unlock the potential of AI in your 3D modeling endeavors!

tools.name: Civitai
tools.description: Civitai is a platform for sharing, creating, and exploring AI-generated media, specializing in open-source generative AI models.

tools.name: Luma AI
tools.description: Luma AI provides advanced AI tools for creating and manipulating 3D content and videos from text, images, or videos.

tools.name: Meshy
tools.description: Meshy is an AI-powered platform for creating high-quality 3D models and assets from text or images.

tools.name: Hyper3D

tools.name: Vivago AI

tools.name: RunComfy

tools.name: Lummi

tools.name: Customuse

tools.name: CGDream
